title: 1st Place - KMIPN VII 2025 (Cipta Inovasi Bidang TIK)
description: Achieved 1st place in the National Polytechnic Informatics Student Competition (KMIPN VII) 2025 held at Politeknik Negeri Padang. The team 'Revoilution' from Politeknik Caltex Riau won in the category of ICT Innovation Creation â€“ Impact and Usefulness Innovation, showcasing innovative ideas with real-world benefits.

title: Bronze Awardee - GINECO 2024
description: Received the Bronze Award at the Global Innovation and Entrepreneurship Competition (GINECO) 2024, together with my team from Politeknik Caltex Riau. This competition evaluates ideas and innovations in the field of technology. This recognition serves as motivation to keep learning, growing, and contributing positively to the world of innovation.
